DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of persons living in the household.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An individual who is considered part of the social unit comprising one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes._To live in a certain place.
